block.p: Two star-studded teams faced off today in the final of the Grand National Team Championship at the American Contract Bridge League's Summer Nationals. The defending champions, all from Florida, include Michael Seamon, Joseph Shay and three world champions: Jeff Meckstroth, Eric Rodwell and Robert Levin. Opposed to them are a Californian squad that includes Lew Stansby, Chip Martel and Peter Weichsel, all world champions; and Rose Johnson Meltzer, Ron Smith and Kyle Larsen.

Two star-studded teams faced off today in the final of the Grand National Team Championship at the American Contract Bridge League's Summer Nationals. The defending champions, all from Florida, include Michael Seamon, Joseph Shay and three world champions: Jeff Meckstroth, Eric Rodwell and Robert Levin. Opposed to them are a Californian squad that includes Lew Stansby, Chip Martel and Peter Weichsel, all world champions; and Rose Johnson Meltzer, Ron Smith and Kyle Larsen.

The Californian players seemed headed for defeat in the semifinal Friday night, trailing by 41 imps with 16 deals remaining against a Philadelphia squad. But a 54-imp stretch effort enabled them to snatch a 13-imp victory. In the other semifinal, the Florida team won comfortably against a Chicago group by 63 imps.
